page.title: 05Hobbies and pastimes
page.content: In our survey of the area we were able to collect information that was based on people's preferences,if they had any.The most popular pastime was football.Over a quarter of the sample chose this example.The next most popular was watching television.Approximately an eighth put this as their favourite.Swimming and bike riding came next.These were followed by running,drawing,and snooker,all of which took about three percent of the total number.Pets,squash,rollerskating,crick et,dancing,horse riding,and rounders ,took very small interest over our sample.
